### 安装步骤
当前操作系统版本为 redhat7.6 其他系统未经测试
```shell
[apache@localhost ~]$ uname -a
Linux localhost.localdomain 3.10.0-957.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Oct 4 20:48:51 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
